classes.name: CryptoKeySlot
classes.note: This meta-class represents the ability to define a concrete key to be used for a crypto operation.

allocateShadowCopy.note: This attribute defines whether a shadow copy of this Key

cryptoAlgId.note: This attribute defines a crypto algorithm restriction (kAlgId

cryptoObjectType.note: Object type that can be stored in the slot. If this field "Undefined" then mSlotCapacity must be larger then 0.

keySlotAllowedModification.note: Restricts how this keySlot may be used Tags: atp.Status=candidate

keySlotContentAllowedUsage.note: Restriction of allowed usage of a key stored to the slot. Tags: atp.Status=candidate

slotCapacity.note: Capacity of the slot in bytes to be reserved by the stack use case is to define this value in case that is undefined and the slot size can deduced from cryptoObjectType and cryptoAlgId. slot size can be deduced from cryptoObject cryptoAlgId.

slotType.note: This attribute defines whether the keySlot is exclusively by the Application; or whether it is used by Stack managed by a Key Manager Application.
